name: Tamagotchi Meets: Sanrio Characters ver.
summary: The Tamagotchi Meets: Sanrio Characters version was released in Japan in June 2019. It features most of the m!xable Sanrio characters from the Sanrio m!x, in addition to several new additions such as Kuromi and Keroppi, and several exclusive locations such as the Strawberry Kingdom and Mariland.
